name: Echo (itch) (Bruno Benicio)
description:
This is Echo.

Welcome to one of the most frustrating puzzle-platformer game.

Without the gift of sight, you must use sound to locate yourself in the environment. Look out for traps! If you touch them, you die!

Jump from platform to platform and try to make it out of each level.

Controls:

  • W, A and D or the arrow keys to move and jump.
  • Space to clap your hands.

Good Luck!
